text: Dangnan meux phwk khea hmdxalay cak khea phwk khea k han hna khea pruksʹa kan tamlaphang phi khn to khxng phwk khea klaw wa “phwk than miru dxk hrux wa phx khxng phwk than di xea sayya xyang mankhng ca kxallxh kæ phwk than læa kxn ni phwk than kdi tha phid phlad nı reuxng khxng yu suf ma læw chan ca mi xxk cak din dæn ni cnkwa phx khxng chan ca xnuyat kæ chan hrux xallxh ca thrng tadsin kæ chan læa phraxngkh thrng pen phu tadsin thi di ying
